requestPreviews.helpRequestBody: When trying to run serenity script in IE im facing with the following error. In my "serenity.properties" file have added webdriver.ie.driver=C:\Automation\Resources\IODriverServer.exe -Dwebdriver.driver = iexplorer but still getting the following error. While trying to run in normal selenium Code the IE works fine. Can you guys help me on it.
Hey, this nasty bug is killing me now, any idea how to tackle this problem?
